metadata.title: CVE-2016-0809 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the wifi_cleanup function inbcmdhd/wifi_hal/wifi_hal.cpp in Wi-Fi in Android 6.x before 2016-02-01allows attackers to gain privileges by leveraging access to the localphysical environment during execution of a crafted application, akainternal bug 25753768.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
